item.description:
Learn about the history, architecture and geography of Fair Haven, a
400-year-old neighborhood within New Haven which at one time was an
entirely separate city. Stops include bakeries, art studios, historic
sites and stores. The ride is very slow-paced, suitable for all
levels, and about 8 miles in total.

The ride leaves from the New Haven Green - Corner of Chapel and College

Tom is the contact for this event - (203) 444-6380
item.name: Fair Haven Historical Landmarks Bike Ride
